#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cstdio>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;
ll fact(ll n)
{
	if((n==0)||(n==1))
		return 1;
	return(n*(fact(n-1)));
}
int main()
{
	ll n,num,i,j,store,ans;
	scanf("%lld",&n);
	vector<ll> v(21);
	v[1]=0;
	v[2]=1;
	v[3]=2;
	for(i=4;i<=20;i++)
	{
		ans=0;
		store=fact(i);
		for(j=2;j<=i;j++)
		{
			if(j%2==0)
			{
				ans=ans+store/fact(j);
			}
			else
			{
				ans=ans-store/fact(j);
			}
		}
		v[i]=ans;
	}
	while(n--)
	{
		scanf("%lld",&num);
		printf("%lld\n",v[num]);
	}
	return 0;
}
